content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) with a drop position at (x=42.5, y=-83.5) and resources of coal.

### Stone Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### Coal Storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) used for storing coal.

### Coal Storage at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5) used for storing coal.

### Coal Storage at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5) used for storing coal.

### Coal Storage at position(x=45.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=45.5, y=-80.5) used for storing coal.

### Inserter System at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) with a pickup position at (x=43.5, y=-81.5) and a drop position at (x=43.5, y=-79.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to insert items into a furnace
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before trying to insert them into a furnace.

### Errors when a chest is full
- Empty the chest at the specified position to continue mining or storing items.

### Errors when an inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the inserter has a valid source of items to pick up.

### Errors when a burner mining drill is out of fuel
- Ensure the burner mining drill has a sufficient amount of fuel to continue operating.

### Errors when there is no iron ore in the inventory
- Ensure you have a sufficient amount of iron ore in your inventory before trying to craft items that require it.
